name: JMForm plugin for TinyMCE
short_description:
Form editor plugin for TinyMCE

Full editing of any and all attributes of forms, inlcuding input elements (like radio, checkbox, buttons, etc.), select elements, and textareas.  No restrictions on target, action, method, etc.  Works as of TinyMCE v2.0.8.
